text:
Sonali Bendre Rings In Her Birthday And New Year In Mumbai With Family And Close Friends!
Sonali Bendre Rings In Her Birthday And New Year In Mumbai With Family And Close Friends!
After a really tough 2018, Sonali Bendre and husband Goldie Bahl are entering this new year with a hopeful heart. Sonali is in Mumbai for her small 'happy interval' from her treatment for high grade cancer.
Sonali Bendre's journey through cancer has been both inspirational and aspirational for reasons more than one. On Monday, she hosted a New Year bash at her residence in Mumbai on Monday.
Invited in the party were her close friends including Sussanne Khan, Hrithik Roshan, Kunal Kapoor, Naina Bachchan, and a few other close friends.
Don't Miss 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES 2.5 K SHARES
Wishing her wife who is a fighter in every sense of the word, Goldie Bahl took to Instagram to write a heartwarming post for Sonali.
title: Sonali Bendre Rings In Her Birthday And New Year In Mumbai With Family And Close Friends!

Sonali is in Mumbai for her small 'happy interval' from her treatment for ‘high grade’ cancer. Sonali Bendre's journey through cancer has been both inspirational and aspirational for reasons more than one. On Monday, she hosted a New Year bash at her residence in Mumbai on Monday.
